alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 26 at 3:19AM EST until November 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most intense snowfall is expected to occur between Tuesday mid-morning through Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
